Welcome to Titan’s documentation!¶

Titan is (or will be) a CTI tool to analyze IoCs and apply machine learning.

Basic API module

..moduleauthor:: Rafael Souza <https://github.com/RafaelSouza94>

api.api_main()¶

Main API view

Returns

For now, just a Status: Working JSON

  • Example:

    Nothing really, just testing still

  • Expected Success Response:

    HTTP Status Code: 200 {‘Status’: ‘Working’}

api.tretas()¶

Tretas API easter egg

Returns

Tretas: Pesadas JSON.

  • Example:

    GET /tretas

  • Expected Success Response:

    HTTP Status Code: 200 {‘Tretas’:’Pesadas’}
